page.title: 02NEW RESIDENTS IN SHIPSTON
page.content: Many new houses have been built in Shipston-on Stour in recent years. There were approximately 1100 houses in the town 5 years ago and there are 1490 in 1985.People are moving to Shipston from various parts of the country, but mainly from the south. We asked several new residents what they thought of Shipston-on-Stour. Mrs Hadgekiss and her family moved to Shipston because her husband's firm moved.She found Shipston convenient for shopping. Mrs Kant moved to Shipston because she liked the new houses. Mrs Wolf preferred Shipston to Manchester because it is smaller and she felt it was better for her children. Mrs Gray said that Shipston-on-Stour was much more peaceful than London, and was the ideal place to live.
